tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geospatial_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  altitude FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  drone_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
  drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  manufacturer TEXT NOT NULL,
  model TEXT NOT NULL,
  max_speed FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (drone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE surveying_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
  latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
  longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
  altitude DOUBLE PRECISION,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE spatial_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    longitude DECIMAL(9,6),
    altitude DECIMAL(8,3),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE mapping_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_name STRING,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    altitude FLOAT,
    battery_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID REFERENCES drones(id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    area_covered FLOAT,
    flight_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_id UUID REFERENCES flights(flight_id),
    image_name STRING,
    image_path STRING,
    resolution FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE maps (
    map_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    region_name STRING,
    map_path STRING,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    drone_id UUID REFERENCES drones(id)
)

CREATE TABLE DroneLocations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    altitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE DroneRoutes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    route_name VARCHAR,
    route_description VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE MappingData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    map_date DATE,
    mapped_area FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DroneImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    image_date TIMESTAMP,
    image_url VARCHAR
)
